experience.description:
- public sector account management 
- sales quota achievement

- Typing of documents in Russian and/or English, including production of dual language letters and other documents, as required 
- Coordinating Manager time plan including appointments, visits, meetings and travel 
- Cost-effectively handling incoming and outgoing telephone and fax communications 
- Data compilation and analysis; production of spread sheets; development of presentations; 
- Handling ad hoc issues
- Organizing travel arrangements including visas, tickets, reservations
- Providing full coordination and control over VIP visits, covering picking up/seeing off, accommodation, catering, etc 
- Producing Purchase Orders 
- Full administrative support for sales team (with HR Department); support for remote sales; contacts with customers on hoc issues
- discount process ownership

- Teaching in 1-11 
 - Language teaching methodology development
